purpose: The email is a call for participation in the 18th ACM SIGPLAN International Conference on Software Language Engineering (SLE 2025), scheduled for June 12-13, 2025, in Koblenz, Germany. It provides details about the conference, including registration information, keynote speakers, awards, and a list of accepted papers. The email emphasizes the conference's focus on software languages and aims to bring together researchers from various related fields.
evidence_sentences: 18th ACM SIGPLAN International Conference on Software Language Engineering (SLE 2025)
The ACM SIGPLAN International Conference on Software Language Engineering (SLE) is devoted to the principles of software languages: their design, their implementation, and their evolution.
Registration happens via the STAF registration page
Early Bird Registration Deadline is May 10th, 2025
During the conference, we will announce the following awards:
To foster the latter, SLE traditionally fills a two-day program with a single track, with the only temporal overlap occurring between co-located events.
